snippet.title: Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures (Sega Genesis/Mega Drive) Playthrough
snippet.description:
This was a really fun game to play when I was a little kid and I still think its fun to come back and play even now. The game is really humorous and has some interesting gameplay. There were a couple times where I got stuck and kinda ran around in circles because I forgot how to do some of these parts. I also deter from the main quest and do the Pac-Jr. cartridge sidequest in the middle. Look below for times that you can skip to throughout the video if you would like to jump around a bit:

PROLOGUE:
00:00:00 - Intro
00:02:40 - Practice

PART 1:
00:06:19 - Part 1: Finding Some Milk For Pac-Baby
00:07:10 - Finding Milk

PART 2:
00:09:05 - Part 2: Finding Some Flowers For Lucy's Birthday
00:14:10 - Finding Flowers

PART 3:
00:17:09 - Part 3: Retrieving Pac-Jr.'s Guitar From The Ghosts
00:27:39 - Finding Pac-Jr.'s Guitar

PART 4 (Part 1):
00:31:20 - Part 4: Stopping The Witch Ghost From Creating The Gum Monster
00:39:33 - Finding ID Card #1
00:40:00 - SIDEQUEST: Finding Pac-Jr. Cartridge #1
00:51:18 - Finding ID Card #2
00:53:24 - Finding ID Card #3

TAKING A BIT OF A DETOUR (Finishing Up Pac.Jr Cartridge Sidequest and playing some classics)
00:55:05 - SIDEQUEST: Finding Pac-Jr. Cartridge #2
00:58:14 - Playing Pac-Man (And sucking horribly at it)
01:05:35 - SIDEQUEST: Finding Pac-Jr. Cartridge #3
01:10:54 - Some bullshit ensues
01:13:36 - The game realizes its shame and lets me play Pac-Jr. (And sucking at it too)

PART 4 (Part 2)
01:17:20 - Continuing The Main Quest
01:26:48 - The Final Battle

EPILOGUE:
01:27:38 - Ending
01:28:02 - Staff Roll
